entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ServiceCollection` class ambiguous reference in v.8.0.1 w/ Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection v8.0.0 #102703
  • Problem when including the `corprof.h` file to use the Profiling API #102701
  • [API Proposal]: Add a parameter to System.IO.Path.GetExtension() for returning the extension without the leading dot #102698
  • Problem when adding null as "Cookie" in HttpHeaders.Add #102697
  • LINQ - use TryGetSpan in Enumerable.Count with predicate #102696

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 3/1/2024 10:59:41 PM #99419
    9.0.0
  • Unset cached variables if necessary after CMake failure #3997
  • Add support for explicit setting culture info for build tools and internal .net messages and resources #4736
  • Perf Test Coverage: Add Test Case to Valid E2E Tracing #5390
  • Split ARCH_SOURCES_DIR into target and platform ones #7537
  • Error "Class not registered" when building inject_debug_resources.vcxproj #7979
  • The "build info" string included in libcoreclr.so contains invalid data #7829
  • Add support for not breaking Windows build on warnings #8277
  • Builds on linux fail to produce a native build log in `bin\Logs` #8543
  • Refactor build scripts to have common code in a common script file #9179
  • [Infrastructure] Add header files to native Visual Studio coreclr projects #9234
  • [Question] Why are we getting the number of cores, rather than the number of logical processors? #9238
  • Native test components do not build with debug info #9560
  • Compiler intrinsic '__m128' error when building clr-samples (Ubuntu/Clang 3.9) #9919
  • GenerateLayoutOnly fails after build.cmd -skiptests #9927
  • Unify build workflow and switch logic for Unix based build workflow #10006
  • Build fails when using enable sanitizers script #10482
  • Cannot run linux-arm64 published binary on CentOS 7 ARM64: GLIBCXX_3.4.21 not found #10839
  • Unable to open System.Private.CoreLib.sln in Mac with "not support framework" error message #11205
  • Intermittent failure to install native OSX dependencies in official builds #11787
  • build-test.sh failing on ARM "Cannot create an instance of the logger." #12851
  • Documentation: Install on CentOS 6 #13299

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Add support for Sve.StoreNarrowing() #102605
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve

Updated

  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update llvm to 18.1.3 and emscripten to 3.1.60 #2595

Updated

  • tweaks to enable NativeAOT-LLVM on Linux with WASI-SDK 22 #2592
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Better System.Text.JSON experience in Source Generators #41174

Closed

  • Dotnet global tools not able to find runtime #41175
  • Publish of Framework Dependent app for a specific OS still requires restores the framework. #9108
    Backlog
  • Enable tab completion for bundled commands like dotnet-watch and dotnet-user-secrets #9105
    Backlog
  • Tests don't run clean with JIT debugger registered #9097
    Discussion
  • No error message is displayed when "dotnet run" fails due to an incompatible RuntimeIdentifier #9093
    Backlog
  • Generate multiple variants of an assembly using same TargetFramework #1966
    Discussion
  • Remove SignNupkg and SignSDKResolverContents targets #9082
    Backlog
  • "dotnet run" passes unexpected arguments to application being run #9080
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish does not set OutDir #9012
    Discussion
  • xunit test fail to load System.Reflection.Extensions when targeting netcoreapp1.0 and not referencing xunit.runner.visualstudio package #8983
    Discussion
  • Value parsing #1836
    Discussion
  • Add dotnet interactive similar to Azure CLI #8957
    Backlog
  • debian auto-updating package? #8937
    Backlog
  • 'dotnet build' fails for test/console projects when parent folder contains a semicolon #8933
    Backlog
  • Consider adding `ref` as alias for `reference` in `dotnet add` #8191
    Backlog
  • Generated AssemblyInfo.cs file should be regenerated after package restore #1142
    Discussion
  • Clarify the different types of install on Linux, and how to uninistall them #8133
    Discussion
  • Auto-add new projects to solution if one is present #8118
    Backlog
  • Future of incompatible-TF checks #1122
    Backlog
  • Building against .NET Framework 4.5 from VB embeds the runtime #1108
    Backlog
  • Remove separate implementations for getting an assembly version when tasks target .NET Core 2.0 #1093
    Backlog
  • dotnet-run sln #8047
    Backlog
  • Remove the dotnet parse command, consider retaining it as a developer feature #8018
    Backlog
  • SDK should warn on lacking runtime when building/publishing an app #1031
    Backlog
  • Revisit Telemetry configuration #7960
    Backlog
  • On Linux and Mac, use Mono to run apps targeting .NET Framework #7931
    Backlog
  • Investigate the intermittent failures of WhenToolAssetsFileIsLockedByNuGetThenCLIRetriesLaunchingTheCommandForAtLeastOneSecond #7903
    Backlog
  • Proposal: dotnet-inspect #7876
    Backlog
  • NeutralLanguage and DefaultLanguage properties for netstandard do not match #953
    Backlog
  • dotnet feedback #7843
    Backlog
  • dotnet restore fails with error for UWP project #7813
    Backlog
  • Inconsistency between : and = for setting command line options. #9322
    Backlog
  • The Test runner will not run .net Core 2.0 tests if the path in Environment variables contains a trailing '\' #2175
    Discussion
  • unable to generate deps.json, it may have been already generated #9251
    Backlog
  • .net core dll as a reference behaves differently from .net #2172

  • dotnet publish crash #9241

  • [ARM32 SDK] Generating native images on ARM #9213

  • dotnet/cli license #9202
    Discussion
  • Nuget_reference_compat test is flaky on OS X #2052

  • VS 15.6 creates net461 exectuables that fail with Microsoft.Win32.Primitives not found #2037
    Discussion
  • .Net core publish output is ugly #9159
    Backlog
  • Tool commands should not permit concurrent operations. #9157
    Backlog
  • Questionable scope of catch (KeyNotFoundException) un DotNetLevelCommandBase #9153
    Backlog
  • Add process to make sure .swr file is updated in VS when necessary #9138
    Backlog
  • Project specifying <Platforms> element cannot be referenced from agnostic project #2005
    Discussion
  • Locally cached runtime/sdk images for dotnet-install #9114
    Backlog
  • error MSB3103: Invalid Resx file #9110
    Backlog
  • Flaky duplicate assembly attribute failure in CI #9109
    Backlog
  • PrivateAssets="All" can be defeated by ResolveAssemblyReferences #1808
    Backlog
  • Install Script should have the option to register the correct package feed for the distro. #8904
    Backlog
  • add package: Add verbosity option #8900
    Backlog
  • [Feature] Add "run in directory" option to dotnet command #8858

  • Upgrading Roslyn with 2.1.1 SDK (from 2.0.0) required changes #1689

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Lower allocations in tagging #73729
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid any sort of work converting from Span to TextSpan #73728
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary array+linq allocs in common case #73727
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option2) #73726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option1) #73725
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove legacy api used only by vs4mac. #73724
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't run code in the async/await highlighter unless on one of those keywords. #73721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to work queue for code definition window #73723
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Streamline brace matcher code #73722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small tweaks to the recursion walk we do when looking for strign indentation regions #73719
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid unnecessary tree walk when hitting non-relevant directives #73720
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce lots of allocations in TagSpanIntervalTree #73715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache the getnode/gettoken classifiers retrieived from the extension manager. #73712
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • All tagger work #73718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not serialize ProjectId.DebugName (in release builds) #73710
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #55896
  • .NET Runtime Not Found While Running Dotnet Global Tools #55895
  • blazor: "Cannot submit the form 'create' because no form on the page currently has that name." Error occurs on submit of a form generated by blazor #55893
  • Backport #52687 to .NET8 #55892
  • Output Cache memory continually grows, PinnedBlockMemoryPool never releases memory #55890
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55889

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55854
  • .NET location: Not found while using dotnet global tools #55894
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55879
  • "UseKestrel" does not work in docker. #55782

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • react native is used extensively in microsoft. Why should anyone use maui? #22657
  • [Windows] .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 4 throws a "combase.dll: A fail fast exception occurred" upon making a grid visible on Windows #22654
  • SetSoftInputMode does not work #22653
  • CanExecute can not change Button clickability #22652

Closed

  • Bug in VS 17.8.3 - MAUI - for windows .net8.0 #20272

PullRequests

Created

  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
